description.displayText: She is very competent ,kind, friendly, lovely person .I highly recommend Shorena for everyone.
description.originalText: She is very competent ,kind, friendly, lovely person .I highly recommend Shorena for everyone.

description.displayText:
Shorena worked in the position of my, then 2 years old, daughter's babysitter from May to December 2018. It was very pleasant and reliably to work with Shorena. She was very attentive towards my daughter. She had managed to establish wonderful relationship with the kid. It was very interesting for my daughter to spend time with Shorena as she was not only entertaining her, but also attempted to teach her simple verses and songs. When my daughter was with Shorena I knew my kid was safe. Her attitude towards her work was excellent. She was always well organized, reliable, honest and always asked me in case she needed advice concerning my daughter.
If you need any additional information, please, feel free to contact me.
